name: Gondola
description:
This was made for a game jam with the theme, "reflection." Row out onto a peaceful lake with Gondola.  

MUSIC: Valse Triste - Jean Sibelius

NOTES: Row your oars with left and right mouse button. The lake isn't infinite and you can get stuck on the banks of it. Esc closes the game at any point. 

FUG :DDD
